scripts.start: echo 'ğŸš€ Starting backend in PRODUCTION mode' && npm run build && node server.js
scripts.dev: echo 'ğŸ”§ Running backend in DEVELOPMENT mode' && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack serve --mode development
scripts.stage: echo 'ğŸ› ï¸ Running backend in STAGING mode' && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging webpack --mode production
